https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fNPOsxAUyNagMHluZ4RPPnJMPb8.jpg Inspired by the true-life experience of its star George Takei, Allegiance follows one family's extraordinary journey in this untold American story following the events of Pearl Harbor. Their loyalty was questioned, their freedom taken away, but their spirit could never be broken. Allegiance
